Following is a list of some recent startup pitch decks published by Business Insider, organized by the funding round that each deck was used for:

The billionaire investor Peter Thiel invested in Trumid and Brex, whose pitch decks you can find links to below. Gettty/Neilson Barnard

PITCH-DECK LIBRARY: The pitch decks that helped hot startups raise millions

Close icon Two crossed lines that form an 'X'. It indicates a way to close an interaction, or dismiss a notification.
description: The best pitch decks weave data, vision, and storytelling in a captivating presentation. Here are the decks that startups have used to get funded.
